column5: Why, it's almost as easy as falling of a log, or maybe a dock!!

classic vid...theres another one where the guy doesnt even use a minnow, he just wiggles his thumb in the water.  boy i sure didnt run into any of those big girls when i was down in alabama, thats for sure. Theres private ponds down south that I have heard of where they have feeders spraying into the pond to feed bass. I remember a tv show about it once and the kid was basically just hammering 10 lbers non stop
No way, fake news? Come on Man! And a lunker to boot. 16 pounds 3 ozs. Come on man. I know they weren't in Newfoundland with them thar accents. Wowza. It sure looks real. I'm dumbfounded.
Does it really matter, OI? I just posted it for amusement on a snowy winter day.
